answers.answer: I also got told my swelling is normal & I have headaches & floaters in my vision.  high blood pressure & took the 24hr urine test they said it was high but since it was fine the last appt I went to they said I'm fine.  so apparently you have to have protein in your urine everytime& have high BP everytime for it not to be normal
Okay I hope everything goes well I really want my baby here but not like this as I've heard they can be small and other problems can occur down the line ftm n just want everything to be perfect

I had the same problems as you. My urine came back fine, but my blood pressure was still really high. They put me on medicine twice a day and now I go in for nonstress tests twice a week to make sure my baby is still being active and not affected by my blood pressure. Apparently high blood pressure makes the placenta age quicker and can cut off oxygen to baby, so now I go in twice a week until i deliver. I have been since 33 weeks and now I'm 35 weeks.

I was diagnosed with preclampsia last week was in the hospital because of that and the fact I have too much protein in my urine. I have to be induced at 37 weeks because I'm at risk for seizures. My baby is doing good so far he's not being affected yet. Will be doing stress test twice a week also until I'm induced.

question: Okay I had an appointment today and I told them I've been having swelled feet they said it's normal I told them okay I just wanted to make sure it wasn't pre-e because I heard that could be a symptom OK my last check up at 30 weeks they took my blood pressure 3 ×s ended up going with the lesser which was like 230 something this time around at 33 week it was 253 then they had me lay on my left side and ended up with 248 so I have to do a 24 hour urine start that Tuesday morning take it in Wednesday he set me up to come next week to run tests I've been having migraines but I've been had them before getting pregnant he told me if they getting any worse go to hospital they checked his heart beat n said it was good OK what would happen next could they make a good delivery for my baby what would they have me to do I'm feeling on edge I just want my baby healthy and here when it's time thanks for help I know this is long
title: Preeclampsia??? Anyone?
